import React from 'react'; import { Container, Typography, Box, Grid, Paper } from '@mui/material'; import { styled } from '@mui/material/styles'; // Styled component for the map container const MapContainer = styled(Paper)(({ theme }) => ({ padding: theme.spacing(2), height: '400px', width: '100%', boxSizing: 'border-box', })); const ContactPage = () => { return ( Contact Us {/* Left Side - Contact Info */} Contact Information Please call us to make any appointments or message us on social media for any questions about our services. Email: info@nailtique.com
Phone: (201) 750-2649 Hours Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 7:00 PM
Sat: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM
Sun: 9:00 AM - 7:00 {/* Right Side - Google Maps */} VISIT NAIL TIQUE 12 PERRY ST, Closter, New Jersey 07624
